WB_Knot

public WB_Knot(int ncp,
               int degree)
Instantiates a uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree

Parameters:
ncp - number of control points
degree - degree of curve

WB_Knot

public WB_Knot(int ncp,
               int degree,
               double[] val)
Instantiates a non-uniform, clamped knot vector for the given number of control points and curve degree

Parameters:
ncp - number of control points
degree - degree of curve
val - non-clamped values of knot, should be non-decreasing and of size ncp-degree-1
